synopsis.text: Campari, an inmate with the power to crystallize dreams into candy, has captured the attention of Jing, the renowned King of Bandits, and his witty, feathered accomplice, Kir. Imprisoned in the world's most impregnable prison, Seventh Heaven, Jing and Kir must navigate a dreamlike maze conjured by Campari in order to steal the coveted Dream Orb. With a reputation for leaving every town he visits better off, Jing's escapades are made all the more thrilling by a vibrant cast of characters, including his trusty sidekick Kir and the enigmatic motorcycle courier, Postino. Will Jing and Kir successfully pilfer the Dream Orb and escape the clutches of Seventh Heaven, or will Campari's dream world prove to be their ultimate undoing? Join this dynamic duo on their daring adventure and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
